short_summary: TBIPS Tier 1 - Pardons and Record Suspension System (PARSS) Tier 1 Requirement
description: Requirements for the replacement of the current Pardons and Record Suspension System (PARSS), requiring expertise in Microsoft Dynamics 365 and Microsoft Power Platform and all included components. Must also include accessible content and applications in compliance with the EN 301 549 Accessibility Standard or Web Content Accessibility Guidelines WCAG 2.0 AA.
full_summary:
## TBIPS Tier 1 - Pardons and Record Suspension System (PARSS) Contract Announcement

### Notice Number and Tender Status

Reference Number: cb-560-23230823  
Amendment Number: 1   
Solicitation Number: 21120-24-4598247   
Publication Date: April 10, 2024   
Tender Closing Date: April 29, 2024 2:00:00 PM EST  
Tender Status: Cancelled (Annulé)  
TSIN: N/A  
Language: English and French  

### Tender Description

Contracting Entity: Correctional Service Canada  
Contracting Entity Address: 340 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 5K3  

### Description of Tender

This contract announcement notifies qualified bidders that a Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued to replace the current Pardons and Record Suspension System (PARSS) with a modern technology solution.

### Description of Services Required

*   The successful bidder will provide expertise in Microsoft Dynamics 365 and Microsoft Power Platform to replace the current PARSS case management solution with modern technology.
*   The services will include the implementation of a public-facing portal to allow online application submission.
*   The work will also require accessible content and applications that conform to either the EN 301 549 accessibility standard or Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0 AA or newer versions.

### Request for Proposal Documents

Proposal documents will be sent directly to the invited bidders by the Contracting Authority, whose contact information is below. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement:

### Important Dates

*   April 10, 2024: Tender notice published
*   April 29, 2024 2:00:00 PM EST: Tender closing date

### Contact

Contracting Authority:  
Stéphanie Gigoux  
stephanie.gigoux@csc-scc.gc.ca  

### Operational Approvals

This contract announcement has been approved by the operational authorities responsible for these requirements.

---

Notes:

*   Above, some informations such as attachments or URLs were not included. However, they should be present in the original document to provide further information.

Please make sure to check the authenticity of information, especially after collecting it from unverified sources.  Good luck!  Good luck with the verifications! Good luck with all your endeavors. 

Hope it meets your standards.
